## Description {#details}

Legacy wrapper pass to provide the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicaaresult">BasicAAResult</a> object.

## Public Member Functions

### getAnalysisUsage() {#a85c4a3f5d899acf70cedc62e6c6e1bc7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void BasicAAWrapperPass::getAnalysisUsage (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysisusage">AnalysisUsage</a> &amp;) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - This function should be overriden by passes that need analysis information to do their job.

If a pass specifies that it uses a particular analysis result to this function, it can then use the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass/#a4863e5e463fb79955269fbf7fbf52b80">getAnalysis&lt;AnalysisType&gt;()</a> function, below.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-h/#l00178">178</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-h">BasicAliasAnalysis.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#l02001">2001</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp">BasicAliasAnalysis.cpp</a>.
